solution_line_template: Grace sold and gave a total of {sold_pies} + {gave_pies} = <<{sold_pies}+{gave_pies}={pies_sold_and_given}>>{pies_sold_and_given} whole pumpkin pie.
Her family was left with {initial_pies} - {pies_sold_and_given} = <<{initial_pies}-{pies_sold_and_given}={remaining_whole_pies}>>{remaining_whole_pies} whole pumpkin pie.

There were a total of {remaining_whole_pies} x {pieces_per_pie} = <<{remaining_whole_pies}*{pieces_per_pie}={total_pieces_made}>>{total_pieces_made} pieces made from the {remaining_whole_pies} whole pumpkin pie.
Therefore, {total_pieces_made} - {pieces_eaten} = <<{total_pieces_made}-{pieces_eaten}={pieces_left}>>{pieces_left} pieces of pumpkin pie were left.
